import portfoliopost from"../data/portfolio.json";import portfoliocategory from'../data/portfoliocategory.json';import blogtags from'../data/blogtags.json';import team from'../data/team.json';// Get Category
function getCategories(items){var elems=portfoliocategory.filter(function(item){return items.includes(item.id);});return elems;}// Tags
function getTags(items){var elems=blogtags.filter(function(item){return items.includes(item.id);});return elems;}// Client
function getClient(items){var elems=team.filter(function(item){return items.includes(item.id);});return elems;}// Post details
function getPortfolio(id){return portfoliopost.filter(function(portfolio){return portfolio.id===parseInt(id);})[0];}export{getPortfolio,getCategories,getTags,getClient};
